description: the fire is low, you should go to the forest and look for wood.
investigationDescription: the fire is low, you should go to the forest and look for wood.

description: the cave is full of life now. the others in your group are going about their day.
investigationDescription: the fire illuminates the inside of the cave.

description: the cave is full of life now. the others in your group are going about their day.
investigationDescription: the fire illuminates the inside of the cave.

description: midday now. someone has rekindled the fire since you left earlier.
investigationDescription: the fire illuminates the inside of the cave. Tei is at the wall, scratching an image onto the wall with the burnt end of a stick.

exits.description: you feel energy for little else but sleep. your normal place next to Tei waits for you.

description: there is a sullen look in the eyes of the others. fear, disappointment, bitterness.
investigationDescription: the atmosphere of the room is heavy. you feel you should not say anything.

exits.description: you feel energy for little else but sleep. your normal place next to Tei waits for you.

description: there is a sullen look in the eyes of the others. fear, disappointment, bitterness.
investigationDescription: the atmosphere of the room is heavy. you feel you should not say anything.

exits.description: it is nighttime. leaving the cave is dangerous<color=purple>, but it must be done</color>

description: the others are asleep. best not to wake them.
investigationDescription: it is too dark to see anything. the fire is gone.

exits.description: there is a comfort in the orb. sleep will come easy.

description: the others are asleep. best not to wake them. tomorrow you will show them your prize.
investigationDescription: it is too dark to see anything. the fire is gone.

description: the others look at you curiously
investigationDescription: the others are focused on the orb you now carry in your hand.
